category-def.name: sdt
category-def.label: Scala IDE for Eclipse
category-def.description: The Scala IDE for Eclipse provides the tools needed to build Scala programs on the Eclipse Platform.

category-def.name: sdt-source
category-def.label: Scala IDE for Eclipse Source Feature
category-def.description: The Scala IDE for Eclipse provides the tools needed to build Scala programs on the Eclipse Platform. This feature provides access (including, e.g. linking) to the IDE plugin's source.

category-def.name: dev
category-def.label: Scala IDE for Eclipse Development Support
category-def.description: The Scala IDE for Eclipse Development support provides tools used to develop Scala-based Eclipse plugins.
